attributes.action: keep UK milk pasteurised, say no to more UHT
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC have reported that the government are concerned about the effects on the environment, caused by pasteurising milk. They are wanting to have more UHT like they have on the continent.

Having this will open the flood gates to imported milk from the EU and cause more British farmers to go out of business.  

The people must resist UHT milk and urge the government to keep our milk British, fresh and pasteurised

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
